channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2023081936
item.description:
Report X-2023081936

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: REDMOND
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet box brought to QA. DescribePack: Found that cap on plastic bottle was loose and some of the liquid spilled out into the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Tightened the cap on the plastic bottle.

item.title: Report X-2023081907
item.description:
Report X-2023081907

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: SPOKANE VALLEY
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING ON BELT, IMMEDIATELY TRANSFERED TO RED LINED TOTE AND SENT TO QA. UPON INSPECTION ITEM HAD CAP COMPLETELY OFF, SECONDARY SEAL BROKEN, POOR QUALITY AND CONDITION. NO INNER PACK. DescribePack: LID, MISSING CAP, .5 INCH OPENING TO BOTTLE, SECONDARY SEAL HALF OFF DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: IMMEDIATELY TRANSFERED TO RED LINED TOTE AND SENT TO QA

item.title: Report X-2023090036
item.description:
Report X-2023090036

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: FIBERBOARD BOX WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND BOX WAS PUT INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023090035
item.description:
Report X-2023090035

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: FIBERBOARD BOX WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND BOX WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. BOX WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE DECONTAMINATED AND BOX WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.

item.title: Report X-2023081808
item.description:
Report X-2023081808

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: When package was brought to QA to be run through HAP, I noticed that the bottom of the package was wet. I immediately set it aside in a lined hazmat tote. DescribePack: Package contains a jug of ZEP CONCENTRATED INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER & CLEANER. The handle on the top of the jug has been forced inward and the plastic around the handle has cracked. This has allowed some of the contents to spill out into the package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately removed and set aside.

item.title: Report E-2023090530
item.description:
Report E-2023090530

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: RENTON
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the metal 5 gallon pail of pronto 13 (un1247) had been damaged by other freight and had released 2 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
